67b3(mdo): kyi mthus som nyi myi bgying zhing the tsom myi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lan gnyis lan gsum du gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag
67b4(mdo): skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir seng ge'i smas bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
67b5(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stonang to// rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin// gshegs pa chos 'phags nga nyid yin te/ 'jig rte rad kyi khams
67b6(mdo): myi mjed der 'grub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams cho sa stond pa mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor po mtshar du gyur cing / rmad du gyur pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
67b7(mdo): la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems can thams cad la seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i bcom
67b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di thos par 'gyur 'ang thos nas kyang yid ces par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ngang ngor dang spar ba ma lags na kang 'dzi na pa dang /
67b9(mdo): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par stond pa dang / mdo sde de 'di me tog dang / 'dug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
68a1(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis mchod pa bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ seng ge'i sgra baspags pa'i mdo sde 'di sems can gang gi rna bar zlo kyi 'gyur ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
68a2(mdo): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu ji smras pa de bzhin te/ legs so legs so//
68a3(mdo): gang de bzhir gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis legs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig rjes su dbul na yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang por dang ldan
68a4(mdo): ba ma yin te/ de dag ngas yongs su bzung ba yin ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang mgron rtsa gnyer bar byed do// de dag gis nga'i byang chub phrag pa la khyer ba
68a5(mdo): yin no// gang snyigs ma lnga dag la bab pa'i tshe mdo sde 'di/ sa mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ngas yongs su smyind par byas/ pa yin te/ tshe rabs gzhan du yang myi 'phan pas yongs su
68a6(mdo): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de'i skye ba rgya mtsho lta bur skams pa yin no// bdud pham par byas pa yin no// nyon mongs pa nams bsal ba yin no// chos kyi cha shi nang du brdungs pa yin
68a7(mdo): no// srid pa gsum rnam par bzlog pa yin no// phyir rgol ba rnams la nges par rgyal ba yin no// nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong
68a8(mdo): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams grangs myed pa phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bde ba'i yod byed thams cad kyis snyen bkur byed kyang / de ba
68a9(mdo): gshegs pa'i sngon gyi rnam par phul ba 'di thos nas dad pa myi byed na/ de nyes pa che ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gror bya bas rim gror byed pa dang
68b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis de gshegs pas yang dag par bstand pa 'di thos nas dad cing sems rab tu dad bas legs so zhes bya ba dbul na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la chud cing bsnyen
68b2(mdo): bkur byas pa de bas 'di bsod nams ches lhag par brgya phrag stong stsogs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu gang dag nga la skyabs su song ba de dag gis mdo sde 'di bri bar bya/ bcad par bya'o// de nas
68b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po dang / 'od 'phreng dang / glog gi 'od dang / spyan rnam par dag pa dang / byams pa dang / myi 'jigs mdzad dang / spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang /
68b4(mdo): 'jam dpal dang / spobs pa dpa' bo dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dang kun tu bzang po dang / de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
68b5(mdo): bcu rtsa bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das srad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe/ snyigs ma lnga la bab pa na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di rgyas par bgyi'o//
68b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i sems can de ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyi
68b7(mdo): na bar mdo sde 'di thos par mye 'gyur te/ gang dag rgya cher 'jug pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' ni skal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du rtogs par dga' lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
68b8(mdo): dag legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// de ltar khyed rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gces pa 'dzin pa lta bur gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
68b9(mdo): de skad ces bka' stsa lad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang mya dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rtend de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
69a1(mdo): gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par stod do// / 'phags pa seng ge'i sba baspags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho//
69a2(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya myi ta bya ha ra na na ma ma ha ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thos
69a3(mdo): cad la phyag 'tshal so// 'di srad ba dag gis zos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
69a4(mdo): po dang thabs gcig pu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dum ze nyis stod kyi byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po dang / yang thabs cig go// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyam
69a5(mdo): pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te// 'dug ko// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs nas/ pra kos thag pa gcig sa bzar nas pra
69a6(mdo): mo g.yas pa'i swa nga sa la bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 2di skad ces gsol to// gas te 'umra zhu ba lung bstan pa'i srad du bdag
69a7(mdo): sa skabs dbye bar gan na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu ba 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
69a8(mdo): pa de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la rtag tu skabs phyes byams pas khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstand pas ngas
69a9(mdo): khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// re skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
69b1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bgyi bar myi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khod mas cad kyis 'da' bar bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i
69b2(mdo): slad du tshe ring du skyong bar bgyid pa dang myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas
69b3(mdo): pa la legs so bya ba byin te byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rtend la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i
69b4(mdo): don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir byams pa khyod legs par rab tu
69b5(mdo): nyon cig dang ngas bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te// bcom lnga/ na 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad
69b6(mdo): ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga dang ldan na/ bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar myi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams
69b7(mdo): cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du sbyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
69b8(mdo): lnga po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyun gyi 'chad par chos spyod pa dang / rgyun myi chad par sems can thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyir ba dang / rgyun myi 'chad par byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga'
69b9(mdo): pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po sdom pa dang / rgyud myi 'chad par mchod rten rnying pa bcos pa dang / rgyu nang myi 'chad par sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ste/ byang chub sems dang
70a1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar myi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems
70a2(mdo): can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos lnga bstand pa 'di
70a3(mdo): bshad pa na dge slong stong ni len pa myed par zag pa rnams las rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyurang to// lnga'i bu brgyad khri ba'i
70a4(mdo): stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa myed pa rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
70a5(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs/ lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bud de
70a6(mdo): bzhin du bab par shes na'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas/ de'i tshe sta nang las langs te/ bra kos phrag pa gcig du gzar
70a7(mdo): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der sogs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ngang /
70a8(mdo): gti mug thams cad kyi bro nad can/ lta ba thams cad kyi rab rib dang / ling tog gi mun pas bsgribs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bro nad gso ba dang / chos kyi myig bla na myed pa yongs su sbyang
70a9(mdo): ba'i srad du bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di/ a la la rmang du byung ba chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstand pa 'di ni// a la la bdud rtsi chen po lags so/
70b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstand pa 'di ni// / a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lags so// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa yang rung ste/ gang dag ni rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par gyur
70b2(mdo): pa de dag mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs bsags pa ste/ sems can las khyad par du 'phags pa lags sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba dang ldan pa lags// skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags
70b3(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa lags so// de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su dag nas/ dud 'gro'i yul de las yongs su thar te myi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing / thos nas kyang tshe rabs snga ma dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
70b4(mdo): ba la dad pa rnyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye ba 'tshal ba de dang der skye bar 'gyur na/ myir gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa 'di/ de ltar
70b5(mdo): sems can rnams don chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs la
70b6(mdo): gnas par 'gyur ba lags te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas myur du bla na myed pa
70b7(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ni
70b8(mdo): de bzhin no// de bden no// de ni de kho na'o// de ni ma nor ba'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the tsom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chu du dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag bcom myed pa/
70b9(mdo): nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rgya cher yang dag par stond pa lta smos kyang ci bgos/ mdo sde 'dzind pa de lta bu dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro//
71a1(mdo): dedags 'dod dgas dang gnyi mug dang / brgyal nga/ sems dang / thob dang / gnod sems kyis gnod pas kyi 'gyur ro// de'i bris pa rims dad das pa grangs kyi 'ar/ na
71a2(mdo): mamado sde 'di lta bu de 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba gnas pa 'am/ chos kyi nam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te/ yod pa'i yul der nad dang sems kyi nang dang gnod pa dko ni su drug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
71a3(mdo): de ras bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das srad kyi ba lnga brgyam yas dam ba'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i nus la bab cing / sangs
71a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jigs pa chen pos/ 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa ma/ bdag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstand par bgyi'o// de dag la gzi byin gsal bar
71a5(mdo): bgyi'o// yul gang na mdo sde 'dzind pa 'di lta bu dag gnas pa'i/ yul der bdag gis dus ma lags pa'i gser ma dang / dgung char/ dang / mu ge dang / bro nad kyi yang ba dang / myings dang / yams kyi
71a6(mdo): na dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa dang / glegs bab tu bgyis pa 'am/ rgya mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i
71a7(mdo): yul der bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol kyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chos kun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang dkar chos smra ba'i 'dis bu dag dang / mdo
71a8(mdo): sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul der bdag gis lo tog dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
71a9(mdo): kyis bka' stsalang pa/ byams pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyis phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i das pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir go ma chen po bgos
71b1(mdo): seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs mo legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad kyis/ phyi ma'i mi phyi ma'i dus lnga bgrub thams dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus pa bam cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jigs par 'gyur
71b2(mdo): 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe khyod kyis nam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstand par bya'o// rab tu bsgrags par bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mos pa skyed par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos nyid chad ma
71b3(mdo): byas la mngon par brtson pas las gzhan gyi bya bar rab tu bsgrags par bya'o// don dam pa'i chos nyid kho na las mams te/ dbang du byas la bstanang par bya'o// ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas
71b4(mdo): bzhin du phyin ci ma log par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bstanadu par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i sgra rnams dang /
71b5(mdo): tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / bcas pa/ rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jug tu phyind pa'i rus la bab pa/ ra shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po
71b6(mdo): byams pa la/ lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang kos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dam dag gis mchod nas/ 'di skad
71b7(mdo): ces bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyis don bgyis pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ma la la bdud rtsi brjod pa lags so zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
71b8(mdo): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'di lta bu thob par dga'/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ yi ker bris shig/ chongs shig/ spogs shig/ kun chub par bgyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa
71b9(mdo): kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci lags// 'di ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
72a1(mdo): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi nam grangs 'di 'dud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
72a2(mdo): pa/ bka' stsalang nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / sgra dang / myi dang /
72a3(mdo): ske ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten du yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stong ngo // 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs so// rgya gar gi mkhan po phrang
72a4(mdo): bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te btan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ da ma tsag ka su tra/ bod skad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo
72a5(mdo): ma// thams cad sa khyen pa sa rgyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska 'ang / gagis thos pa'i rjes shi/ yangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das par na seramong sa pa ri dgas kyi nags nazhugs te/ den bcom ldan
72a6(mdo): kyis snga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsald pa/ dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa 'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ myig skyes so//
72a7(mdo): shes pa dang / rig pa dang / bro dang / rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag pa sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog
72a8(mdo): bar 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes tshul bzhin yin la byed pa na/ myig skyes so// shes pa dang / rig pa dang / bro dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag pasngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug masngal 'phags pa'i bdes
72a9(mdo): rengs mngon par shes pas/ yongs su shes par bya'o nas tshul bani na yid la byed pa dbyig skyes so// zhes pa dang / reg pa dang / bro dang rtogs pa byis so// dge slong dgar son ma thos pa'i chos rnams pa
72b1(mdo): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de/ ngas mngon par shes pas spangs par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang / rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag
72b2(mdo): nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la// sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa de/ ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ myig skyes so// shes pa dang / rig pa dang /
72b3(mdo): blo dang / rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag bsngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na myig skyes
72b4(mdo): so// shes pa dang / rig pa dang / glo dang rtogs pa skyes so/ nga dge slong dkang sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'phag nga rdzas pa'i bangan pa dngas mngon par shes pas bskam par byal zhes
72b5(mdo): tshul bzhan yang la byed pa na myag skyes sa// shes pa dang / reg pa dang / gla dang rtags pa skyes sa / dge slang dag nga sngan ma/ zas pa' chas rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden
72b6(mdo): ba da ngas mngon par shes pas yangs su shas sa zhes tshul bzhan ya la byed pa na/ myag skyes sam/ shes pa dang rag pa dang / pra dang / rtags pa skyes sa// dag slang dag nga sngan ma thas pa'i chas rnam
72b7(mdo): sdug bsngas kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de/ ngas mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag pa
72b8(mdo): sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so// zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang
72b9(mdo): blo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dgang sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgoms so zhes chus bzhin yid la byed par
73a1(mdo): myig skyes so// shes pa dang / rig pa dang / bro dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag pa ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor
73a2(mdo): ba'i myig ma skyes// shes pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ blo ma yin/ rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du/ nga l+la dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenang bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
73a3(mdo): skye dgu dang / lha dang myir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang / nges par byung ba dang myi ldan pa dang / rab tu grol ba dang / phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur cing / dge slong dag ngas bla
73a4(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar myi shes so// dge slong dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la da ltar lan gsum
73a5(mdo): du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i myig skyes ni/ bshes pa dang / rig pa dang / blo dang / rtogs pa skyes pa de na/ sa nga s+tha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang bcas
73a6(mdo): tshangs dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram zer ba'i skye dgu dang lha dang myir bcas pa 'di las krol ba dang / nges par byung ba dang / myi ldan pa dang / rab tu grol ba dang / phyin ci log dang bras
73a7(mdo): ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par 'gyur cing / dge slong dag ngas de nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so// chos kyi rnam grangs de bka'
73a8(mdo): stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+ya dang / lnga brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+ya la bka' stsa smad pa
73a9(mdo): ko'u rgya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'das pa lags so// ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so// kun 'tshal
73b1(mdo): mas so// me dang ldan pa ko lu rgyas chos kun shes pas/ de'i phyir me dang ldan pa ko'u de n+ya kun shes/ ko'u di n+ya zhes tshig tha dgas su btags so// me dang ldan pa ko diras chos kun shes so nas// sa zla
73b2(mdo): gnod sbyin rnams spa sgrogs par byed do// grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ra na ser drang srong smra ba'i ri rigs kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu banyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa// dge
73b3(mdo): spyong dang / bram ze dang / lha 'am/ bdud dmatshangs pa 'am sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten da la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang
73b4(mdo): myi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bskor bas nga lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing / lha mo yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so// sa pra'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra thos nas/
73b5(mdo): nam mkha' la smra ba'i gnod sbyin dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum kha'i lha dang / 'thab bral dang / dka' ldan/ dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga rnams kyis
73b6(mdo): skad cig re dang thang cig re dang yud tsam de dang skad cig dang ga tha cig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig nyid kyi bar du swa bsngags so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sba ba spogs par byed de/ grogs te/
73b7(mdo): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis pa ran ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi gnas su san gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'am po chos dang sA dpa/ dge slong ngas/ bram ze 'am/ 'am bdud dam/ tshangs lam/
73b8(mdo): sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba/ skye bo mang po sa phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten das snying rtse ba dang / swa dang myi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
73b9(mdo): bskor bas/ lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyings bsgrags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ra na ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te
74a1(mdo): rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan par bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshig bla dgas su gtags so// / chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//
74a2(mdo): // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ba ra mA rA dA ma bi dza ya na ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gcig go/ sangs rgyas
74a3(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par ka ya'i ri la dge slong mngon par zhug tsA
74a4(mdo): pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mu bcurtsa dgra thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ kyo ba phrag nyi bum brkyang dang / de da srong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad/
74a5(mdo): khri drug song dang / kyang drug zhi dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcun/ nyis dang / drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdu ra ba lngas yan lagazig pa kya sagasas rus mgo pags kyis/
74a6(mdo): yog pa lto zhar zhing skra'i khur khyer ba lus dku ba \u0f7f/ g.yang bzhi dang / shin shun gyon pa lag na ril pa thogs pa brgyad khri ba'i stong dang yang thabs gcig go// rgyal par 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/
74a7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rib ltar/ drang srong rnams kyi nang na lam me lhan ne lga de ste/ lug rnams kyi nang na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra/ srin bu mye khyer gyi drung
74a8(mdo): ma chu minang ma tog gis na/ ma da rnam mal 'di 'i rgyas po kyi gams pa na ba dang 'am ldan 'das dang thabams kyi napa nyis kya du ma //
74a9(mdo): dam bcom ldanas dam che po gdong ba zhes bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin nga la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul dpag tu byed par mdad cing / gro g.yas g.yos gnyis nas 'od zer thung ba/ deng
74b1(mdo): xxx
74b2(mdo): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgya stong dpag tu myed pa byung / 'khor los spyang ba dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bskur ba dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / rigs sngags 'chang dpag tu myed pa zung
74b3(mdo): rgya dang ri grags pa dang / 'gro ldang ba dang / go phyogs pa dang / nags khrod pa dpag tu byed pa byung / rgyal rigs shings la chen pos bu dang / zas ze dang / khyim bdag shing sa sa chen po la bu dang / gyi gzugs dang / ra byang dang /
74b4(mdo): mdog dang / swa ba'i sang sna tshogs pa ji srid pa dang / wa'i ris dziH/ da pa de dag thams cad de ba'i dgashegs pa'i skus byung ngo // de nas 'khom chen po de the tsom tu gyu rad nas pan chun ka dong dusa'o// byang chub sems
74b5(mdo): dpa' rnams la rab tu dka' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs pas rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'ang/ sa rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzind las bzhengs te/ seng ge bskyi/
74b6(mdo): pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sas kyi hrI sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la/ snang
74b7(mdo): ba de dag thams cad lag 'thil du gzhag pa bzhin du myi mjed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams su kun tu sdang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ji ltar byung ba de 'dra ba 'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
74b8(mdo): cho 'phrul phyung ste/ de ba'i ma gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa srung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ka sa pa de logs su dong ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi rang du 'dus par gyur /
74b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu byed pa dag kyang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag dang / snyan cig tu bzhi ma gshegs pas mchod patsa
75a1(mdo): dpe' myed pa thogs te/ 'dir lpags so// de bzhin du spa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / swa ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa du ma re/
75a2(mdo): ngag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul kyigyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod pa bla na myed pas/ bcom ldan
75a3(mdo): 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa
75a4(mdo): byung ba de dag kyang mnar myed pa yan chad 'og myin gi gnas man chad du mngon par byung ste/ yang slar log go// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pa byung ba/ ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das
75a5(mdo): shag kya thub pa'i spu'i thung bu thams cad du nub bo// gang dag pacom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa phyung ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas tham/ sa cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
75a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal pa'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ pra kos phrad pa gcig du bzar ras/ pus mo g.yas pa skangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs sutha
75a7(mdo): mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par sod do// kye ma myi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis// sngon chad ma byung mdzad par sna chog 'di/ skye dgu kun la sbyar du kur bstan pa/
75a8(mdo): de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis/ phan tshun dag tu tshig du smra bgyid pa/ kye ma'o sha nid tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi// bdag ga ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lpags ko/ bdag cag bcom mo/ bdag cag bcom zhes mchi/
75a9(mdo): dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can myi gyurang// nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las// bdag 'khogs bdag bskams bde ba rnams las nyams/ bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyurd ma yin// yi ge ma
75b1(mdo): mchis rdzu 'phrus gsung rnams kyis/ bstanang pa'i dgra rnams mog mog por gyur par mdzad/ bstand pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni// sangs rgyas sras la dus stond chen po mdzad// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom
75b2(mdo): 'tshal bar 'gyur// dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste/ gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang // 'jig rtend 'gon po sangs rgyas rgyu rad cig mchi// 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur
75b3(mdo): bgyis// sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas rnams kyis bskor// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis// cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstanang du gsol// 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags// thub pa chos ni
75b4(mdo): gang zhig gsung bar bzhed/ 'khod 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags na// sems can thugs brtse bsrad du bdag la gsungs// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'khor de'i nang nas// drang srong chen po
75b5(mdo): mye ba smon zhes bya ba gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung / po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye gzho nu re shig kha rog shig/ 'o// bos dri ba dri bar bya'o// gal te kho bo'i dra ba khong du chud bar byed na ni
75b6(mdo): de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i mying yang mthun no// 'on te/ sred myed kyi bu dang dbang phyug chen pos phung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed du zad na ni/ 'dir ro mtshar yang myi che ste/ skyes bu ngan
75b7(mdo): ba dang / sgyu ma mazhan rnams kyis 'di grub po de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dzum pa'i zhas kyis drang srong kyis tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas dra srong chen po mye smon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen
75b8(mdo): po ci nus kyi dri bi dris shig dang / rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po mye sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ke ko'u ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung / ci'i srid du
75b9(mdo): bskal pas bseg par 'gyur/ sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang na sems can phra ba khru kang tsam 'am/ mtho gang tsam 'am/ 'dzum mo// tsam 'am/ mthe bo tsam 'am/ nas dang
76a1(mdo): khro dang / sod man sde'u dang mon man kre'u dang / tis dang / yungs 'thutsa ma 'am/ sems can cim zhig gi rang da mchis bka' sol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po kye smo sa drang srong cheran po//
76a2(mdo): legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// drang srong chen po che bskal pa drug bcu pa'i dri ba dri ba 'di ni 'thun pa'o// de na drang srong chen po rnams po mtshar du gyur da te/ drang srong chen po mye sgo'i tshe'i tshad ni ma brjod par bdag cag sman cig
76a3(mdo): gnas gnas pa rnams kyang ma shes na/ 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// drang srong chen po kang ngas sems
76a4(mdo): can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkye na nas/ skye ba dang / rga shi'i bar du 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkye nad las sems can skye ste rgyu rkyen ni ma
76a5(mdo): drang srong chen po yang pha mas 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// kang gi tshe yong / sa su rtogs pas kun nas bsrang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud mye/ da kyi 'ong du 'jug pa de ni de'i rkyen no// drang srong chen po yang sdug
76a6(mdo): bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no// nye bar len pa'i phung po
76a7(mdo): lnga dang / khams brgyad ni sems can no// drang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la sems can yang gzhan ma yin no// drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib pa ma yin 'phel pa
76a8(mdo): yin no// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma kas te/ sems can la 'grib pa ma mchis/ 'phel ba ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can phyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur/
76a9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ drang srong chen po de ring snyed du smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no// gal te dbang sbyar dbang sgyur yin du zinan mi / dbang myed par 'chi ba'i myi rigs so// drang srong chen po gang
76b1(mdo): gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ srin bu mye khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu gling snang bar bya'o// snyam du sems pa'i rkye nad kyis/ srin bu mye khyer gyis
76b2(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling sdang bar byed dam/ sems ma rul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur dan ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe/
76b3(mdo): dbang sbyar dang / nyon mongs pa dag khyi la yang yod cing / dbang sbyar la yang yod pa de'i tshe/ sems can la 'grib pa yang myi dmyigs 'phel ba yang myi dmyigs so// drang srong chen pos gsold pa/ go'u ta mas nyon mongs
76b4(mdo): pa 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po ngas phyin ci log dag bzlog pa yang myed/ 'grib par byas pa yang myed drang srong chen pos/ gsol pa/ gal te de ltar na
76b5(mdo): khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang / dbang sbyar ma yin no// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/
76b6(mdo): ko'u ta ma bka' mchid 'di re shig zhog/ ko'u ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las/ sems can skye bo zhes gsungs na/ sems can mang du 'grogs pa las/ sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur da pa
76b7(mdo): 'di ji lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyod la dpe' stan par bya'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur/
76b8(mdo): ro// de la res 'ga' ni gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi sbag ma sa bon gyi 'os su myi 'gyur ba de ji lta bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol da pa/ ke ke'u ta ma rlung dang nyi mas shing thog rnams ma rung bar bgyis so//
76b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can 'bras bu rnams ma rung bar byas so// drang srong chen po kha cig ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ srim bu
77a1(mdo): rnams kyis zas so// kha cig ni las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so// drang srong chen po shing gyi nyes pa nyung ngo // sems can gyi nyes pa ni mang ngo // drang srong chen po yang sems can kyi khams ni yongs su rtogs
77a2(mdo): pa kun nas bslang ba ste/ drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sred pa la dmyigs te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas/ kun nas
77a3(mdo): spang ngo zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye gyo'u ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go// ci'i slad du bskal pas bsreg par 'gyur ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/
77a4(mdo): drang srong chen pos chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas sreg par myi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la myi rtag la la la rtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar myi 'gyur ro// /
77a5(mdo): drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin brtan pa ma// yin/ dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa zhes bya ba'i mying thob bo// drang srong chen po bram
77a6(mdo): za'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhyend par mtshan 'asol pa ni mthun no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur ngan 'di ni dus
77a7(mdo): bzang po'i// 'di ni dus ngan pa'o zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa myed par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par bya ba'i las rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pa
77a8(mdo): pa tha dad pa myed par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/ bskal bas bsreg pa'i 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ drang srong chen po sems can ji snyed pa bsgral pas bsregs par
77a9(mdo): 'byung ba zos nas/ ngang par 'gyur ba'i sems cad de snyed/ de ba'i ma gshegs pas bsus pa'i dngos pos srung par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'dis me dper na/ 'chung ldag pa'i sbrul ni myig gis kyang rung
77b1(mdo): na pa dang / ma dang 'a'i sgonas kyang rtsub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de sa sa me/ byin pas kyang chud/ sman par skabs kyang srud// don spyod pas kyang srung ngo // don 'thun pas kyang srung ngo // drang srong chen
77b2(mdo): po 'di lta ste dper na gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir myer 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gser dul ma ma yin pa 'di lta ste/ rul mar gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir myer 'jug ste/ shi nang tu sregs pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyur
77b3(mdo): ro// rin po ches sbas ra/ de'i rin ring zad myed par 'gyur te/ drang srong cher po de'i phyir gser gdung ba dang / bsregs pas rnam par spyod ngo // drang srong chen po de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
77b4(mdo): rgyu myed par bsregs pa'i skal ba byin te/ 'dir sems can gang la ya nga gnod par myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po mye sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bskal pas bsreg pa'i mye
77b5(mdo): phyung yang / sems can gang la yang gnod par myi 'gyur ba de ni ngo ma/ tshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen/ po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni sems can gang la gnod par myi
77b6(mdo): mdzad do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcur rnams char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas ni drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
77b7(mdo): nye bar gnas te/ rang kyi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ches mang ngo // drang srong chen po de'i tshe sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyi gzugs kyang mthong / 'dog
77b8(mdo): mdzes pa yang mthong skal bas bsregs pa'i 'jigs pa las/ bdag nyid sgrol bar yang mthong nas dka' ba dang / mchog tu dka' ba skyes te 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang 'di
77b9(mdo): ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur da cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur da cig ces 'dzer to// kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'brus bu mngon sum du byed/
78a1(mdo): kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kha cig ni rang byang chub/ kha cig ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig/
78a2(mdo): pa ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa gnod/ kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du s+ye/ kha cig ni sum bcu rtsa gsum dru kha cig ni mtshe mar/ kha cig ni dka' ldan du/ kha cig ni 'phrul dkar/ kha cig ni gzhan
78a3(mdo): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur 'og myin gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnas/
78a4(mdo): dang / khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du yang 'gyur ro// drang srong che na po rnam grangs 'di lta bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi
78a5(mdo): sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las grol bar mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes/ par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa las chos nyid thos nas
78a6(mdo): bsrab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro// thabs 'dis nangaran song na 'gro bar gyi 'gyur ro// rlung srong chen po yang sa bcus gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myig la/ sa'i 'amam
78a7(mdo): ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de bas ni sems cad kyi khams gang 'khor ba la/ spyon chags par shes nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed pa ches mang ste/ drang srong ches
78a8(mdo): chen po'i de'i phyir skal pas sreg par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po mye sngon gis rang kyi yid kyis rnam par spyad nas tshig du smras pa/ kye ma'o gang bdag la drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa/ shag kya'i sras 'di'i che
78a9(mdo): nyid ni rgya re'o// bdag gis 'di la bkram pab kyang chog ste/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyend par mngon par bgyis kyang 'di sa yang dag pa'i mying kyis bod par bya'o// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
78b1(mdo): la drang srong chen po mye sngon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyurd cing mkhyend pa dpag tu ma mchis pas/ thams cad mkhyend pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba/
78b2(mdo): bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gnas myed pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'du bar gyur ro// drang srong cher po zag pa gcig
78b3(mdo): kyis 'byung ba la sems can 'dra bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro//
78b4(mdo): drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na chu klung tha dad pa dang / klung phran dang / klung chen po dag kyang rgya mtsho chen por bab nas ro cig tu 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad par byed pa de
78b5(mdo): dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'khor bar 'du bas/ sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba/ ni 'du ba ma yin pa'o zhes pa smra'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste
78b6(mdo): dper na chung kyis pangs nas/ phye ma leb phyi byinA la 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung myed na so sor 'gyes so// drang srong cher po de bzhin du sems cad dpyal par 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'phan tshun las 'brel/
78b7(mdo): ba'i sems cad kyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'dis bur phar chud las kyis 'bres pa dag yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur/ dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur te/ der de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro//
78b8(mdo): drang srong cheran po la/ dang myi rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong cheran pos gso sang pa/ thams cad zis kyis gnod pa/ thams cad ma byed pa phyir skyes pa 'di sems cam me ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig dang 'dus par/
78b9(mdo): byur ngo to// bdud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas yi dgas su skyes pa 'di 'dus par gyur to / zhes bgyi ba'i bar ji sngar 'das par 'gyi ba zag ma thos dacig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
79a1(mdo): bka' stsal pa/ drang srong cher po sems can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid myi bde bar 'gyur ba re zhe sdang bar yang 'gyur/
79a2(mdo): des de mthong nas gal te na de klad pa na bar yang 'gyur// bshang ba 'am gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyurapa
79a3(mdo): pa des kyang bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na/ gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa
79a4(mdo): thams cad mkhand pa/ dud 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnam sa kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ myir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe/ phan tshun
79a5(mdo): mthong ba na mngon tu mdud par 'dzind pa/ 'di las bdag/ gis skyon ji ltar skyed snyam du/ skyon tshol ba 'di ni drang srong chen po/ dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/
79a6(mdo): bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu rud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yi rigs su skyes pa rnams ni/ dring ba 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred par 'gru
79a7(mdo): ro// pha ros la sbyin bar bsams kyang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro// kar dang de yi dgas su skyes nas/ snyan cig 'dus par gyur pa de'i/ dbang phyug mthong nas/ phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/ gzham
79a8(mdo): gi nor sa 'dod par gyur da te/ 'di ni yi rigs su skyes pa rnams kyi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di ldan cig tu yi dgas kyi nang da gnas gangs mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang song chen po
79a9(mdo): phyir skyes pa kang sa la rig tshe rabs gzhan dag na 'dus par 'gyur ba de mthong na/ 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni phyir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do//
79b1(mdo): de dag dang 'di myi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag slar skyes te/ 'dus par gyur pa las myir skyes pa de dag gi 'dus
79b2(mdo): pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skyes te/ 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par gyur te/ de ras bdag dang 'di ltar skyes te/
79b3(mdo): lhan cig 'dus par 'gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po me smon dga' mgu ste/ yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
79b4(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhye dang po nyid du smon par myi bgyid pa'i sems can dag ni bslus pa'o zhes bdag chad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po mye smon la 'di skad
79b5(mdo): ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po'i nang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba ji tsam cig yod ces/ nga la de skad zer ba ni/ drang srong / chen po gang sems can du dmyigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam
79b6(mdo): bar 'byed do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ la la 'ag gis dbus long zhig la 'di skad du kye skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya bangi 'dra zhes smras na/ drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems ma mthong
79b7(mdo): ba'i phyir 'jog dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes de smra bar nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 'brel ba gang la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab/ drang srong chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long skams
79b8(mdo): mthong ba'i phyir sems can zhes bya ba ni phra mo ni 'di lta bu zhig go zhes sems cad brjod par myi nus so// drang srong chen po yang myig la sems cad zhes bya ba yang myi rnyed do// na ba dang sA dang lce dang lus dang / yid
79b9(mdo): sa sems cad zhes bya ba myi rnyed // drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la sems cad zhes bya ba myi rnyed do// drang srong cheran po khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag
80a1(mdo): gnyis dang / nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba myi rnyed/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba myi rnyed do// drang srong chen po myig ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o skad cig kyang myi gnas pa'o//
80a2(mdo): de bzhin du rna ba dang sA dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o skad cig kyang myi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o skad cig kyang myi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po
80a3(mdo): myi gtsang ba'i rdzas su bcu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang myi gnas so// sems can zhes bya ba yang myed// gzugs kyang myed de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su
80a4(mdo): 'gro'o// yongs su rtog pa pa gang dag las rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ri srog dang / gso ba dang skyes bu dang / gang bag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu myi dmyigs so// drang srong med po gas te sems can song du
80a5(mdo): zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis/ shi nang tu chos stond par myi 'gyur ba zhig na/ drang srong chen po gang gi// phyir sems can myed pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob ste/
80a6(mdo): de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar yang dag par 'gyur ba des de ltar yA dag par 'grub po/ de sa bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po mye sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ba com ldan 'das dang slan chad drang srong chen po mye sgron bdag thams cad
80a7(mdo): mamyo dang pa nyid du smond par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskas pa mu mchis par sems can dmyal ba'i thugs kyi 'obs su gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ mi ba 'og myir gnas tsam du gyu rang ba 'thon pos
80a8(mdo): nas bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gdung ba lnga bskal pas sreg pa lta bur 'gyur ba 'am/ nyi ma bskalang par gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ bskal pa sum bcu'i zla ba gcig du sbyar bar 'gyur ba
80a9(mdo): de lta bu de lta bu dka' ba spyad par ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ste/ 'dun gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni/ brtsod 'grus nyams par myi bgyi'o// drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed
80b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi gam du lpags pa de dag kyang gnad las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng sran chang thar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub cu zo
80b2(mdo): par 'gyi'o// jo tsa thog kyis brtsor 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// drang srong rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin mtshams nas/ 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung / phyogs bcu'i sangs
80b3(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyis kyang sbyin mtshams nas/ 'dul pa can zhes bya 'od gzer phyung ste/ 'od gzer de dag gi mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu gsos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ sdeg rab tu sreg so//
80b4(mdo): shar phyogs mtho' ma/ sgo phyogs dma'// nub phyogs dma' na byang phrogs mtho/ nub phyogs mtho' ma/ byang phyogs dma'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du me tog gi
80b5(mdo): phab/ rnga bo che rnams brdungs so// dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong ba/ rnams kyis kyang / yan lag lnga pa'i sil snyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stong ngo // lha'i gdug pa dri rab tu rim po nga
80b6(mdo): kyang rlung kyis dang bsrangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gam du ngad lnga bar byed do// byang chub sems dpal rnams rab tu dga' ste/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du
80b7(mdo): do shal dang se mo do rnams 'thor zhing / rin po che'i char yang 'bebs me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang
80b8(mdo): mchod par byed do// lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dka' nas/ mye tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba'i char 'bebs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dka' mthu yi rangs te/ ji ltar myor gyor pa'i gos rnams
80b9(mdo): de bzhir gshegs pa'i sku la gsolang to// de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer nges 'og myin gyi gnas man chad sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed pa yan chad sdang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zas
81a1(mdo): cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par
81a2(mdo): shag thub pa di ri 'dir/ phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer myi gtong ste/ 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom gyur da lags na// thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston// myi'i 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' bar gyur
81a3(mdo): te// rab tu dga' bas lag pa bsod bgyis nas/ kha cig 'dir bcom ldan 'das legs shes mchi// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rtenang skyong ba rnams// nam ma'a' gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs dang bsod// mal
81a4(mdo): las lnga'i me tog char du 'bebs// ma brdungs rnga chen dag ni sme yang 'byin// dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga khyod kyis drang srong chen po mye smon mthong ngam/
81a5(mdo): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor drang srong chen po mye smon 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// sangs rgyas
81a6(mdo): stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi rig rtend gi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya bar 'gyur
81a7(mdo): ro// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi bying sang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnas par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga drang srong chen po brgyad khri ba'i spong kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag
81a8(mdo): tu phyir myi ldog pa'i rjes su thob ste/ rab 'byor nga de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i gsung rab la sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og du/ de bzhin gshes
81a9(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag gling zhes bya bar 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' tshad myed pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag
81b1(mdo): tudapa' bar 'gro ba 'ad ba du thos ste/ yang dang skangs yin mashes pa'i ti 'dzidzi dang / rgyas pas dbang badrang pa'adzi nge 'an dang / sbrulas bu'i ti de la mi dadang / rnams rnam par byed pa
81b2(mdo): 'dzind dang / bro gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rab 'byor
81b3(mdo): sgra phye ba phrag gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad myed pa dag gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum cu
81b4(mdo): byas so// rab 'byor da lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / sta phye chen po dang / myi ma yin pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
81b5(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa/ sa don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer na/ mas phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi
81b6(mdo): dbang pos khams par mdzad de/ sngags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od kazer 'di lta ste// sngon po dang / ser bor dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang /
81b7(mdo): rdul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag 'jig rtend kyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyi
81b8(mdo): su nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros myi zad pa stan las langs te/ bra gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'dra
81b9(mdo): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum par myi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus
82a1(mdo): ba mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsa yang to// rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams kyi don tu sngags 'di
82a2(mdo): lta bus ni brdzun myi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir ljags kyi dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis
82a3(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
82a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis/ bde bar sbyor ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/
82a5(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod/ rtend byed na/ de bas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las za na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lupa 'bogs na/ 'di bsod
82a6(mdo): nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ad pa na/ gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so// zhes bya ba byin pa de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stong bar 'gyur ro//
82a7(mdo): gang gis 'di la rim 'gro byas pa des nga la rim 'gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ngas
82a8(mdo): nga ni bden par smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa'i sa phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i seMs
82a9(mdo): cad rnams kyi sman du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lan gsum brjod dam/ brjod du bcug na nges ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
82b1(mdo): gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'dir 'dug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba dang bcas bzhin du/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
82b2(mdo): mdzod kyang gzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par myi 'gyur ro// gang dag myi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su
82b3(mdo): dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gang gis sangs rgyas stong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags
82b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dad dam 'chang ngam/ klog kam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
82b5(mdo): stond par 'gyur ba'i lag du byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do// des myig lnga thob par 'gyur// dbang po ma tshang bar myi 'gyur/ dran pa brjed pa myed par 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
82b6(mdo): thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi snying po'i ting pe 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi snyad pa la tang pa 'jand dang / gtsug gi
82b7(mdo): nor bu'i phyag brgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dbang sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzi nang rab tu thob par 'gyur// yi ge myed pa'i za ma tog gi bzungs thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams
82b8(mdo): cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang / the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang / don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de dag las stsogs pa bzungs dang / ting nge 'dzind gi sgo brgya
82b9(mdo): stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho/
83a1(mdo): dur gyur pa la bka' sas dpa// 'jas dpas sangs rgyas mang po la mnyen bgrar byas pa khyod pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyis sang dpa yang rgya ma yang dag par rab tun kyi
83a2(mdo): 'phags pa'i don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// /
83a3(mdo): rgya gar gang du/ rgyam hA smad pa sa da p+pa b+han dam hA sa nA ma? tra// bod sad du/ 'phags pa the
83a4(mdo): chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
83a5(mdo): po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu
83a6(mdo): zhugs te/ thams cad kyang bdud dang phyir rgos pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi kun du rgyu ba las ring du gyurd pa/ bsams bzhin du
83a7(mdo): srid par skye ba kun tu ston pa la dbang ba chen po'i sa thob pa/ bskal pa dpag tu myed par lus dang / gnas gtong ba'i dbang thob pa/ bdud kyi las tshad myed pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad shinang tu rab tu
83a8(mdo): rtogs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i thabs kyi mchog zhes pa/ nges par 'byung ba thams cad shes pa'i stobs chen po thob pa/ mu stegs can gyi smra ba thams cad bcos pa
83a9(mdo): pha mkhas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa cher pos skye bo phas po che'i nye bar bsdu ba la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa chen po'i bsgoms pas/ rnal 'byor da chen po rnam pa thams cad thob pa/ nam
83b1(mdo): mkha' lta bur 'jig rtend kyi chos kyis sems ma gos pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pa gsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dri ma myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
83b2(mdo): dad pa myi sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rab 'jug dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rab gnas dang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa ma nyams dang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa myi g.yo dang / byang chub sems
83b3(mdo): dpa' dad pa rab chol dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dad pa 'i rjes su 'brang dang / byang chub sems dpa' da pa la yang
83b4(mdo): dag par zhugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa 'jug byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa la yid gnyis rnam par 'jom dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa stond dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa
83b5(mdo): rab tu 'dom byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rnam par 'a/ phel byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rnam par skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i snod yongs su chos dang / byang chub
83b6(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pa thabs chen dang de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / 'od srung na po las sogs pa dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / lnga dang
83b7(mdo): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang 'a dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa tshad myed pa dag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dun gyis byas te/ 'khor brgya stong
83b8(mdo): du ma'i nang na gzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa mang po 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang
83b9(mdo): las dang po pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag las rtsams te gtam rtsom par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag gal te ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa chen po'i phyir// theg pa chen po la dad na don
84a1(mdo): chen me zhing 'bras bu che me/ phan yon che'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po ba mos pas spyod pa la zhugs pas theg pa chen po la dad pas yang du gnas par bya'o// de nas byang chub som/
84a2(mdo): dpa' dad pa thabs chen po sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa
84a3(mdo): la ba de sogs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po sa dad pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par
84a4(mdo): bgyi ba gang lags// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir// theg pa chen po la dad pa skyes pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po/
84a5(mdo): pa dang po rab tu 'bye ba rnam pa du zhig mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po dad pa'i phan yon rnam pa du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas
84a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' tshad myed pa dag gi don kyi phyir zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dor 'di yongs su dri bar sems dpa' legs so legs so de'i phyir rigs kyi bu nyon
84a7(mdo): cig dang don de bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu bcu gcig po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste gsal ba'i
84a8(mdo): mtshan nyid dang / brlan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang / yang dag pa'i 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sbed
84a9(mdo): ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rjes su 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rgyun gyi mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// dad pa thabs chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nas
84b1(mdo): kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnyog pa rnam pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg
84b2(mdo): pa chen po sa dang pa'i mtshan nyid do// nog pa rnam bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khong khro ba'i rnyog pa dang / yid kyi ches pa'i rtog pad / pe cos kyi rtog pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po
84b3(mdo): dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyis theg pa chen po la khong khro ba'i sems skyed myi srid do// zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams la yid myi ches pa'i sems skyed myi srid do// zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams la sang sman
84b4(mdo): kun tu snang bar 'gyur gyi sring ngo // zab cing rgyache ba'i chos rnams la myi mthod pa dang / thecom par 'gyur gyi srid do// byang chub sems dpa' dang pa thabs cher gyis gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'i slad dusas dang po pa'i
84b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mo tha spyod pa la zhugs pa/ chos shes pa rko// gas pa ma mchis par theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba 'dis/ bu dag la the tsom ma mchis shing // the tsom gyi rnyog pa dang bral ba
84b6(mdo): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid ma gtogs pa'i zhes pa nyid theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba dag la the tsom gyi rnyog pa dang bral ba
84b7(mdo): ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gi dring las mos pa'i stobs kyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba dag la the tsom myed cing / the tsom gyi rnyog pa dang bral ba yin no// 'di ltar las dang po pa'i byang chub seMs//
84b8(mdo): dpa' mos pas spyod pa la zhugs pa ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba bstan pa dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dbang du byas nas/ chos 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes// de bzhin
84b9(mdo): gshegs pas thugs su chud pa la mos pa bzhag nas/ chos la ma log par mos pa 'jog go// gzhan gyi dring las mos pa'i stobs des de bzhin gshegs pa zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde'i chos rnams la the tsom dang
85a1(mdo): bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol pa/
85a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pas brtan pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bgyi ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems das
85a3(mdo): theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa cher po la dad pa dang ldan pa'i yid bde ba lus brlad pa dang / sems bachar ba gang yin pa de ni/ de'i brlan pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg
85a4(mdo): pa chen po'i phyir// / theg pa chen po la dang ldan pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / yid bde bas lus dang sems tshim par byed pa yin gyi 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan las byung ba'i
85a5(mdo): bde ba dang med brde zas ni ma yin no// gzugs dang gzugs myed na spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba/ de ba gang yin pa des ni/ 'di 'dra bas de dag gi lus dang
85a6(mdo): sems tshim par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rag gi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rim zhi ba'o// ci'i phyir ma zhi len gang 'dod pa'i yon tan las byung ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba rang
85a7(mdo): 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba de ni de tsam du 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang ldan pas ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do// mthon dman gyi rgyu'i phyir ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do// bden pa rnams
85a8(mdo): sa sid gnyis dang / the tsom myi za ba'i rjes su song ba'i phyir// rab tu ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'i di 'dzind pa dang / de'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa tshad myed dang 'brel ba'i phyir
85a9(mdo): rab tu zhi ba'i mtshad nyid do// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci log dang / g.yeng ba dang / rgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tshar myed pa'i rtsa ba'i phyir rab tu ma zhi ba'o// 'gro ba lnga'i sam snga chos
85b1(mdo): mngon par 'du byed pa'i rtsa ba'i phyir rab tu ma zhi ba'o// sdug bsngal gi bden pas bsdus shing 'gro ba'i phyir rab tu ma zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di skar nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / tshe'i kun nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rang
85b2(mdo): 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun la 'jug pa dang ldan pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las byung ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba mi rab tu ma zhi ba ste/ de bas na de'i lus dang / sems tshim par byed pa ma yin no// ji skar 'dod pa la lo/
85b3(mdo): spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan las byung ba dang / yid bde ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod pa rnams kyis snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba yang rnam pa de dag gis ci rigs par rab tu ma
85b4(mdo): zhi ba'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// rab tu ma zhi bas na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba lus dang / sems tshim par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung
85b5(mdo): ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / mthon dman gyi rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / bden pa la yid gnyis dang / the tsom
85b6(mdo): pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / ngar 'dzind pa dang / nga ra'i 'dzin pa dang / de'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar 'gyur ba chad myed pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci log dang
85b7(mdo): g.yeng ba dang / rgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tsha myed pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / 'gro ba lnga'i las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pas
85b8(mdo): bsdus pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba dang / 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bur bcis pa'i rgyun la 'jug pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o// rab tu/
85b9(mdo): zhi ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba lus dang sems tshim par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pas/ brlan pa'i mtshan nyid do// byang chub sem
86a1(mdo): dpa' dad pa thabs chen gyis/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po sa dad pas brlan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba'i
86a2(mdo): do 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa la byung ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i don la rab tu mos par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
86a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa gsum
86a4(mdo): gyis theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ yid ches pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang / mngon par dga' ba'i rno ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
86a5(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dang po med ces pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal tha
86a6(mdo): cing rgya che ba'i chos bstand pa rnams la thog ma nyid du yod par mos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs par 'os pa'o//
86a7(mdo): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rtog ke ba rnams kyi yul ma yin no// 'di ltar rtog ge ba rnams kyi zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di lta bu dag thos nas snang bar 'gyur te/ rtog par lta ka/
86a8(mdo): la 'gyur// de bas na de dag ni rtog ge ba rnams kyi yul ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ji lta bar de dag gis bstand pa'i chos de dag kyang de bzhin du yod do// de phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
86a9(mdo): bas nang pa zab cing rgya che ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa la yod pa nyid du mos pas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yid ches pa'i rnam pas rad pa skyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams
86b1(mdo): kyi theg pa chen po'i srid du/ theg pa chen po la dad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pas/ 'jug pa ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bab cing rgya che ba'i chos yod pa yom tan/
86b2(mdo): dang ldan pa dag la rnam pa du mar mos shing lus kyi 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi 'gyur ba dang bcas par theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
86b3(mdo): theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu spu ldang ba dang / spu g.yo ba dang / mchi ma 'khor ba dang / mchi
86b4(mdo): ma 'dzag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa che nu po la dad pas las byung ba'i lus kyi 'gyur ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i phyir/
86b5(mdo): theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i sems kyi 'gyur ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus la/ sa byung ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba rgya che ba kha na ma tho ba myed pa
86b6(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i sems kyi 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen pos
86b7(mdo): dad pa 'gyur ba'i rnam pas 'jug go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa gang lags bcom ldan
86b8(mdo): 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon sems can chad myed pa'i phyir gyur pa rnams kyis brtsom
86b9(mdo): 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes pa'i stobs kyis zab cing rgya cher ba'i chos 'di rab tu snyed do// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i dus na yang sems can tshad myed par myir gyur//
87a1(mdo): nas/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes pa'i stobs kyis zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di rab tu rnyed na/ bdag myir gyur la rkye nang rnyed bzhin zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di thob par bya ba la brtson 'grus nyams papa ci'i
87a2(mdo): phyir bya zhes de ltar shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na rtag par rgyu na tu zab cing rgya che ba dag la dad pas des mngon par dka' ba skyes shing / mos pa skyes pas gnas so/
87a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pas 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen
87a4(mdo): po la rang ba'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i yongs su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
87a5(mdo): sras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bsod nams dang / ye shes tshad myed pa yongs su bzung nas skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
87a6(mdo): na/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ mtho ba'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ gzugs bzang por
87a7(mdo): gyur pa 'am/ phyug po'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ yid bzhungs pa dang / bro dang dran pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyogs dang g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur ba 'am/ tshe ring por 'gyur ba 'am/ dbang che bar
87a8(mdo): grags par 'gyur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs zhing sa la chen po lta bu'i ngogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ bram ze shing ma la chen po lta bu'i rigs su 'gyur ba 'am/ khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu'i rigs su 'gyur ba 'am
87a9(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du skye bar 'gyur ba 'gyur ba 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang /
87b1(mdo): 'jig rten stong pa nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / bdud nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'am/ gzugs kyi bsam gtan tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ bcu shes byed 'du shes byed myir srid pa'i me mo'i bar du pa
87b2(mdo): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pas bsod nams dang / ye shes yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ste/ stod kyi ma dang / brgya stong
87b3(mdo): gi cha 'am/ grangs sam/ cha 'am bgrangs pa 'am/ bskrun pa 'am/ zla 'am/ dper yang myi zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rtend pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba rab tu ma zhi ba dang / khrel ba'o/
87b4(mdo): mthon dman rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel pa'o// bden pa rnams la yid gnyis dang / the tsom za ba rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel pa'o// ngar 'dzin dang ngar yir 'dzind pa dang / de'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa tshad myed pa
87b5(mdo): rab tu ma zhi ba dang / 'brel pa'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci log dang / g.yeng ba dang / rgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tsha myed pa rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel pa'o// 'gro ba lnga'i
87b6(mdo): pas sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'brel pa rab tu ma zhig dang 'brel ba'o// sdug bsngal gi bder bsdus pa rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar 'jig rten pa'i rtsa ba de dag ni
87b7(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang / las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / cha dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun la 'jug pa rab tu ma zha ba dang 'bral ba'o// rags kyi bu da ltar 'dzag rtend pa'i rtsa ba de dag na nyan mongs pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bur
87b8(mdo): bcas pa'i rgyun la 'jug pa rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel pa dag go// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang / 'brel pa bsod nams dang ye shes yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi
